languages.text: Одна из малых цистерн Пятого Машинного зала вместо отработанной воды оказалась заполнена жидкостью, похожей на кровь. Это происшествие не посчитали сколь-либо серьезным. Как и ожидалось, после выхода в реальный мир вода снова вернулась к нормальному состоянию.

traits.locale_text: Одна из малых цистерн Пятого Машинного зала вместо отработанной воды оказалась заполнена жидкостью, похожей на кровь. Это происшествие не посчитали сколь-либо серьезным. Как и ожидалось, после выхода в реальный мир вода снова вернулась к нормальному состоянию.

languages.text: It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.
languages.original_text: Одна из малых цистерн Пятого Машинного зала вместо отработанной воды оказалась заполнена жидкостью, похожей на кровь. Это происшествие не посчитали сколь-либо серьезным. Как и ожидалось, после выхода в реальный мир вода снова вернулась к нормальному состоянию.

traits.locale_text: One of the smaller vats in the Fifth Engine hall was filled to the brim with a liquid that resembled blood instead of processed water. This was not considered an emergency, and everything came back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

One of the smaller vats in the Fifth Engine hall was filled to the brim with a liquid that resembled blood instead of processed water. This was not considered an emergency, and everything came back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

One of the smaller vats in the Fifth Engine hall was filled to the brim with a liquid that resembled blood instead of processed water. This was not considered an emergency, and everything came back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

One of the smaller vats in the Fifth Engine hall was filled to the brim with a liquid that resembled blood instead of processed water. This was not considered an emergency, and everything came back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

languages.text: 船员们发现，5号引擎大厅的某个小桶原本应该装满废水，但此刻却装满了像血一样的液体。上级军官认为这件事情并不值得特别关注。当飞船返回真实世界之后，一切都恢复了正常。
languages.original_text: It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

traits.locale_text: 船员们发现，5号引擎大厅的某个小桶原本原本应该装满废水，但此刻却装满了像血一样的液体。上级军官认为这件事情并不值得特别关注。当飞船返回真实世界之后，一切都恢复了正常。

languages.text: Se ha descubierto que una de las cubas de menor tamaño de la sala de máquinas 5, que debía estar llena de aguas residuales, contenía un líquido de apariencia similar a la sangre. Se ha desestimado la importancia del incidente, que ha vuelto a la normalidad al regresar al espacio real.
languages.original_text: It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

traits.locale_text: Se ha descubierto que una de las cubas de menor tamaño de la sala de máquinas 5, que debía estar llena de aguas residuales, contenía un líquido de apariencia similar a la sangre. Se ha desestimado la importancia del incidente, que ha vuelto a la normalidad al regresar al espacio real.

languages.text: エンジンホール5内、排水が溜まるはずの小タンクのひとつに、血液のような液体が入っていることが判明した。この事件は重大な問題ではないと判断され、船はリアルスペースに戻ると同時にすべてが元通りになった。
languages.original_text: It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

traits.locale_text: エンジンホール5内、排水が溜まるはずの小タンクのひとつに、血液のような液体が入っていることが判明した。この事件は重大な問題ではないと判断され、船はリアルスペースに戻ると同時にすべてが元通りになった。

languages.text: Es wurde festgestellt, dass einer der kleineren Kessel in Maschinenhalle 5, der eigentlich mit Abwasser gefüllt sein sollte, stattdessen eine Flüssigkeit enthielt, die wie Blut aussah. Dieser Zwischenfall wurde als nicht weiter besorgniserregend eingestuft, und alles kehrte wieder zur Normalität zurück, sobald das Schiff wieder im Realraum war.
languages.original_text: It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

traits.locale_text: Es wurde festgestellt, dass einer der kleineren Kessel in Maschinenhalle 5, der eigentlich mit Abwasser gefüllt sein sollte, stattdessen eine Flüssigkeit enthielt, die wie Blut aussah. Dieser Zwischenfall wurde als nicht weiter besorgniserregend eingestuft, und alles kehrte wieder zur Normalität zurück, sobald das Schiff wieder im Realraum war.

languages.text: Il fut découvert que l'une des cuves inférieures de la salle des machines 5, qui aurait dû contenir des eaux usées, était remplie d'un liquide ressemblant à du sang. Cet incident fut classé comme non préoccupant, et tout revint à la normale dès que le vaisseau retourna dans l'espace réel.
languages.original_text: It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.

traits.locale_text: Il fut découvert que l'une des cuves inférieures de la salle des machines 5, qui aurait dû contenir des eaux usées, était remplie d'un liquide ressemblant à du sang. Cet incident fut classé comme non préoccupant, et tout revint à la normale dès que le vaisseau retourna dans l'espace.

languages.text: 5. Motor Salonu'ndan küçük tanklardan birinin atık suyla dolu olması gerekirken kanı andıran bir sıvıyla dolu olduğu fark edildi. Bu olay, ciddi bir endişe kaynağı olarak görülmedi ve gemi gerçekuzaya döner dönmez her şey normale döndü.
languages.original_text: It was discovered that one of the smaller vats in Engine Hall 5, which should have been filled with waste water, instead contained a liquid that looked like blood. This incident was deemed not to be of serious concern, and everything went back to normal as soon as the ship returned to realspace.
